isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - AERODYNAMIC PANELS - AERO SIDE SKIRT PANELS - INSTALL

step1.para: Position deep channel bracket to frame and determine which crossmember bolts to remove. Remove only those crossmember bolts necessary to mount the deep channel to the frame.
Position deep channel bracket and replace crossmember bolts by bolting through the deep channel bracket.
Position angle brackets as required and mount to frame rail using bolts, washers, and nuts.
Insert step support arms into deep channel bracket and cross bolt arms to bracket using bolts, washers, and nuts. Finger tighten nuts at this time.
Bolt aero side panel support arms to angle brackets. Finger tighten nuts at this time.
Position battery box/tool box bracket and mount using bolts, washers, and nuts. Finger tighten nuts at this time.
With an assistant, position aero side panels and attach them to the support arms using capscrews and washers. Lightly tighten at this time.
When all aero side panels are hung on a side, align them as required. Tighten all support arm mountings and all panel face capscrews.

caution.para: Do not drive a 9400 at road speed unless all aero side panel mountings are secure. Check all aero side panel support arm bolts and all panel face capscrews.
